SELECT SEQ_WISHLIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WISHLIST ( WISHLIST_SEQ, USER_ID, ROOM_SEQ, REG_DT ) VALUES (#{wishlistSeq}, #{userId}, #{roomSeq}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT w.wishlist_seq, w.user_id, w.room_seq, w.reg_dt, r.room_title, r.room_addr, r.average_rating, r.review_count, ri.room_img_name FROM wishlist w JOIN room r ON w.room_seq = r.room_seq LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_seq, room_img_name FROM room_image WHERE sort_order = 1 -- 대표 이미지 조건, 예시 ) ri ON r.room_seq = ri.room_seq WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY w.reg_dt DESC
